data.eml:eml: Oligoaeschna sirindhornae sp. nov., a new dragonfly species from Thailand (Odonata: Anisoptera: Aeshnidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ngiam, Robin W. J., Orr, Albert G. (2017): Oligoaeschna sirindhornae sp. nov., a new dragonfly species from Thailand (Odonata: Anisoptera: Aeshnidae). Zootaxa 4353 (1): 195-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4353.1.13
